function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Allocation of scarce resources in socioeconomically different urban areas","Impact":"Inequitable distribution of life-saving resources and increased risk of disease spread in marginalized communities","Mitigation":"Implement transparent and inclusive decision-making processes that consider community diversity","Technologies":"Decision-making software for resource allocation","People":"Marginalized communities","Owner":"Decision-makers and service providers"},{"Description":"Lack of transparency and public understanding in decision making","Impact":"Lack of public support and resistance to implementing disease prevention measures","Mitigation":"Promote transparency, clarity, and openness in decision making to generate public understanding and support","Technologies":"Public engagement platforms and communication tools","People":"General public","Owner":"Decision-makers and public institutions"},{"Description":"Oversimplification of biological systems in mathematical models","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions and ineffective disease prevention strategies","Mitigation":"Use advanced modeling techniques that account for complex biological systems","Technologies":"Advanced data modeling and simulation software","People":"Researchers and modelers","Owner":"Research institutions and modeling organizations"}]}
